name: ApplyNuspecVersionToAssemblies
description: Applies the version found in a nuspec file to all assemblies in the source folder.
author: Adam Lith

inputs.name: nuspecPath
inputs.label: nuspec file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the nuspec file to use

inputs.name: versionSuffix
inputs.label: Version suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional suffix to set to a version number, for example '.$(Build.BuildNumber)'
